text: Razve ty ne vidish', chto Allakh gonit oblaka, potom soyedinyayet ikh, potom prevrashchayet ikh v kuchu oblakov, i ty vidish', kak iz rasshchelin yeye izlivayetsya liven'. On nizvergayet grad s gor, kotoryye na nebe. On porazhayet im, kogo pozhelayet, i otvrashchayet yego, ot kogo pozhelayet. Blesk ikh molniy gotov unesti zreniye
